ing: 2 tablespoons frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
des: "A refreshing twist on the classic wine punch. White wine and peach schnapps are floating with white peaches and raspberries. A hit at summer parties! Serve over ice and use a slotted spoon to include sliced peaches and raspberries with each serving. May be topped with 7-UpÂ® or lemon-lime soda for a bubbly drink."
ins:
Stir white wine, peach schnapps, and orange juice concentrate together in a large pitcher; add peach slices.
Refrigerate until completely chilled, at least 2 hours; add frozen raspberries just before serving.
